languages.text: "Возможно, в них ты видишь упрек своей аскезе? Моя броня покрыта патиной и пылью, твоя — сверкает. Ты чтишь себя, я — просто орудие".
"Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, в них ты видишь упрек своей аскезе? Моя броня покрыта патиной и пылью, твоя — сверкает. Ты чтишь себя, я — просто орудие".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your ascesis? My armour bears patina and dust while yours shines bright. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."
"Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your ascesis? My armour bears patina and dust while yours shines bright. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."
"Perhaps this is because you see them as a reproach to your ascesis? My armour bears patina and dust while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

"Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."
"Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

languages.text: "Vielleicht, weil Ihr sie als Kritik an Eurer Askese anseht? Meine Rüstung trägt eine Patina und ist verstaubt, während Eure strahlend sauber glänzt. Ihr verehrt Euch selbst, ich führe mich selbst lediglich als Waffe."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht, weil Ihr sie als Kritik an Eurer Askese anseht? Meine Rüstung trägt eine Patina und ist verstaubt, während Eure strahlend sauber glänzt. Ihr verehrt Euch selbst, ich führe mich selbst lediglich als Waffe."

languages.text: « Peut-être est-ce parce que vous y voyez une forme de condamnation de votre ascétisme ? Mon armure est patinée et poussiéreuse, quand la vôtre brille comme un sou neuf. Vous vous drapez dans la dignité de votre fonction, tandis que je me contente d'exécuter la mienne. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être est-ce parce que vous y voyez une forme de condamnation de votre ascétisme ? Mon armure est patinée et poussiéreuse, quand la vôtre brille comme un sou neuf. Vous vous drapez dans la dignité de votre fonction, tandis que je me contente d'exécuter la mienne. »

languages.text: «Tal vez los considere un reproche hacia su ascetismo. Mi armadura está llena de polvo y pátina, mientras que la suya reluce y está impoluta. Usted se venera, mientras que yo me blando cual arma».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez los considere un reproche hacia su ascetismo. Mi armadura está llena de polvo y pátina, mientras que la suya reluce y está impoluta. Usted se venera, mientras que yo me blando cual arma».

languages.text: 「禁欲主義を非難しているように見えるからなの？私の鎧には古色と埃が付着しているけれど、あなたは明るく輝いている。あなたは自分自身を崇拝しているけど、私は単に自分自身として振る舞うだけよ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

traits.locale_text: 「禁欲主義を非難しているように見えるからなの？私の鎧には古色と埃が付着しているけれど、あなたは明るく輝いている。あなたは自分自身を崇拝しているけど、私は単に自分自身として振る舞うだけよ」

languages.text: “或许这是因为你认为，我们的做法是在侮辱你的禁欲主义吧？我的盔甲满是铜锈与灰尘，而你的盔甲却光洁明亮，一尘不染。你想让你自己成为神圣的化身，而我只把我自己当成利刃挥舞。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

traits.locale_text: “或许这是因为你认为，我们的做法是在侮辱你的禁欲主义吧？我的盔甲满是铜锈与灰尘，而你的盔甲却光洁明亮，一尘不染。你想让你自己成为神圣的化身，而我只把我自己当成利刃挥舞。”

languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."

languages.text: "Belki de onları çileciliğine dair serzeniş olarak gördüğün içindir. Benim zırhım, küf ve toz kaplıdır. Seninkiyse tertemiz, parıl parıl parlıyor. Sen kendine hürmet ediyorsun. Bense kendimi silah gibi savuruyorum."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is because you see them as a reproach to your asceticism? My armour bears patina and dust, while yours shines bright and clean. You venerate yourself, whereas I simply wield myself."
